name: Ultra Fidget Spinner
description:
A Fidget Spinner is a type of stress relieving toy game.Try to earn a high score in this crazy addictive fidget spinner games! Spin the toy as many times as you can, earn coins and buy upgrades!

Use your finger to play with this ultra Fidget Spinner App Simulator and spin as much as you want in Fidget Spinner games!

Don’t miss the best interesting Fidget Spinner game APP! DOWNLOAD NOW !
